When i first joined Steam back in 2008, i had heard about Left 4 Dead coming out in November of 2008, i was excited to buy it, it looks really fun!, Then i heard they released a Demo for it, i downloaded it right away it was alot of fun.  I recommend getting 3 other friends together and do the campagin mode it is great fun !
Shoot and blast your way through zombies as zoey, bill, francis and louis in this FPS multiplayer co-op zombie shooter From Steam.

A must get for L4D2 or zombie lovers!
+Better atmosphere for scares
+More fair gameplay (Versus)
+No annoying charger,jockey, or spitter
+Hunter,smoker,boomer,witch,tank's awesome old look
+Cool animations
+&-No melee weapons and less guns
-Dumber bots
+Better survival maps
Buy it now!

The only reason I got it is for the achievements - things I've done in Left 4 Dead 2, but wasn't rewarded for.

Some updated thoughts! This game runs leaner than Left 4 Dead 2. It loads faster and there's less cluttering it up. No workshop support, though. So as far as I know, non-campaign mods aren't really a thing. Oh, and the player's viewmodel includes a torso and legs/feet, so if you look down, you can see your feet, something not too common in first-person shooters, especially Valve-made ones.

Better than L4D2.

Cleaner, Simpler, Less Confusing. 

The guns actually feel like they have an impact.

Level design is better, zombies aren't throwing cheap shots, and you don't have to walk 50 miles to get to each checkpoint. In general a better experience.

Only problem is that the AI for the survivors is so fucking retarded, and no one plays this game anymore.

And Valve's customer support is awful.
Un juego muy entretenido, y para pasar un buen rato soltando adrenalina :D

the great game that i cant seem to stop playing, is one of the best zombie games i have ever played. this game is compatible with many computers. i have a low end pc, but this game some how was able to run on max settings. most others with graphics that are bad seem to lag more then the visually mastered Left 4 dead. there is more then just a "regular zombie", in this game.
zombies sprint and are hard to attack. Not only are there sprinting zombies, but many unique infected such as, Boomers, Hunters,smokers and many more. BUY THE GAME NOW! for only a price of $19.99 you will be sucked into this action packed thrilling and exciting game. so pay a dollar per 100 hours of fun NOW!!

Zombies VS. a Vietnam veteran, a college student, a biker and a white collar black guy.

This game's co-op made it one of the top zombie apocalypse survival games out there.
It isn't Call of Duty or any other first person shooter. One person can't carry the whole team forever. Some of the game's zombies have certain abilities that FORCE the players to work together. If one player runs ahead of the group, there will be a zombie who incapacitates a player and the only escape is by the help of a teammate. 
Left 4 Dead is the epitome of undead apocalyptic teamwork. It truly is worthy of all the praise its recieved.

My rating: 
9/10.
This game is really really good but L4D2 is better. Buy L4D2.

Проблема с маленьким количеством игроков, действительно, присутствует. Порой просто не с кем играть. Но я все равно настоятельно советую поиграть в эту игру. Даже если у вас нет друзей, вы всегда можете поиграть с ботами. Это не менее увлекательно, особено когда играешь на максимальном уровне сложности. Так как разработчики не поленились проработать и мультиплеер, и одиночную игру. Во всем остальном игра так же отлично проработана.

Score: 90%
I really liked playing this game for a few months. I think it's one of the best cooperative first-person-shooters I've ever played. I like playing as a human or as a zombie captain.

The first zombie FPS that went viral. Buy it! There wasn't anything like it when it came out. It set the standard for future FPS zombie games. It doesn't have skillsets or perks or character advantages, it's relies solely on skill. It has several gamemodes, storyline, wave, versus, etc. Multiple maps. Requires team effort. If someone leaves the group or someone isn't pulling their weight, you will feel it. It can be frustrating at times with noobies and trolls but join a group, play on expert with said group, and watch miracles happen. Good times.
This game is a masterpiece. More games should be focused around working together like this one. Truly different from all of the other zombie shoot-em-up games out there. 11/10!
Classic !! Recommended Recommended Recommended

Left 4 Dead is a game I almost didn't buy. I knew it was a co-op shooter from Valve but for the $60 price new when it came out I nearly didn't splurge. That being said, I have meet many friends on L4D. Though now all the content in L4D is included in the sequel so go buy L4D2.
This game drives me crazy and yet i want to keep playing.
The classic team zombie game. It's like the French call, erm, I don't know what.

The best co-op game i have ever played to date, not a game where its made and then co-op is chucked in, this is pure co-op at the core and valve truly did make one hell of a title.This game features a single player mode where the AI takes over as your companions and to complete a series of maps point A to point B you will have to get past hordes of zombies, but online mode is where the fun is at, if you have a few friends that can join you you will have alot of LOL moments and VS mode is pure genius, one team plays as humans and the other plays as the infected, the infected team need only destroy the humans before they reach a safe house, you have to cooperate or you will fail and that goes for both teams. I played this game so much i was hearing zombies in my sleep and made a few friends along the way, this is a must buy and i highly recommend it. Overall 8/10
Better than L4D2, even if you are less special infected, this game have more server in hard mode than lf4d2. So more challenge, more fun. ;)

One of the most fun games around, Left 4 Dead offers an excellent (and often hilarious) multiplayer experience, especially the Versus mode. Very highly recommended (plus the online player base is fairly decent) and, by the way, 9.3 user rating on metacritic after 3000+ ratings. That's quite a testament to the quality of this game.

Although I've rated it up, if you can afford Left 4 Dead 2, I suggest you buy that instead (actually it's the same price as L4D as of Feb 2015). The prequel has been completely superseded and by now, L4D2 contains all the campaigns that were there in L4D.
10/10 would reccommend!

Review for both one and two (because they both are fairly similar)

Incredibly fun for solo gameplay, and even more fun with friends. I highly recommend modding it to get even more fun out of it, whether it be changing th zombies to stormtroopers and your melees to lightsabers, or turning your health kit into a refreshing can of monster energy. All campaigns are worth playing through fully, especially the sacrifice (no spoilers from me!) And all the different mini bosses and the tank really make teamwork all that more vital, 9/10, both excellent plays.
Muito bom, sobreviva se puder!

Great solid game. The multiplayer is a blast and the story was fun. The levels are well thought out and very interesting so the game never gets stale. This game changed the face of zombie games and came out of the gate huge. If you haven't played this, you're probably living under a rock.
massivley improved with the macho man randy savage mod.

It's a pretty good shooter, although now it's overshadowed a bit by Left 4 Dead 2, which also was given away free during the Christmas. In general though, this is still worth getting just for the charm of the old characters and the maps offered.

Left 4 Dead - легендарная игра от создателей Counter-Strike и Half-Life. Старые игры меня очень привлекают. Counter-Strike, Half-Life, Dead Space, Left 4 Dead - это все те игры, от которых брала исток своего развития игровая индустрия. Большую роль здесь играет простота игры, ничего лишнего и со вкусом. В кооперативе играть очень весело убивая орды зомби.

There are such games which don't differ an interesting plot or a gameplay, but remain in the hearts of players on long and for many years. One of the brightest representatives of such peculiar exception to the rules - Left 4 Dead shooter from the Valve company. All game consists of four (a standard set) big missions which are subdivided into five collateral. Everyone begins and comes to an end in special shelter where players can take breath. Any the check points on a course of passing of collateral missions - lost - be so kind as since the beginning. It adds also a headache and the aggressive drive, especially when you play on the maximum complexity, and opponents, well very strong and cunning. In such rooms always there is an opportunity to dolly up wounds, to take the new weapon, to fill up quantity of cartridges or to take a bomb with Molotov's cocktail. Here such here game)) (This my opinion and it can not coincide with yours).

Great game, I've owned it for many years but never played it until my friends started playing L4D2. I started going through the game but then noticed everything from L4D1 was ported to L4D2. Although I really like how you can look down in L4D1 and see your body, this doesn't happen in L4D2. That's about the only difference I noticed.

THe only reason I don't recommend purchasing it is because you can buy L4D2 and get everything L4D has and more, it's just a better value.
